          <title>
            <string language="sv">Kardemummaplantor</string>
            <string language="en">Cardamom plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kardamompflanzebetriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines de cardamome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas do cardamomo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante del cardamomo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις καρδάμωμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plantas del cardamomo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Från dessa plantor växer kardemumma i små kapslar.</string>
            <string language="en">From these plants, cardamom grows in small capsules.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Von diesen Betrieben wächst Kardamompflanze in 
den kleinen Kapseln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De ces usines, le cardamome se développe dans de
petites capsules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Destas plantas, o cardamomo cresce em cápsulas 
pequenas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da queste piante, il cardamomo si sviluppa in 
piccole capsule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από αυτές τις εγκαταστάσεις, το καρδάμωμο αυξάνεται 
στις μικρές κάψες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De estas plantas, el cardamomo crece en cápsulas
pequeñas.</string>
